message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's a great deal, considering its value to me is much higher. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. I would like to counteroffer at $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a good deal for both of us, and it gets us closer to an agreement. Let's make this happen!
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to consider $13,200 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to you and my budget constraints.
